Usage

How to install

To install:

pip install blahblahblah

Creating recipes

lumache.get_random_ingredients(kind=None)

Return a list of random ingredients as strings.

Parameters

kind (list[str] or None) – Optional “kind” of ingredients.

Returns

return – The ingredients list.

Return type

list[str]
